name: Doublelinx
description: Buy and Sell Online Marketing Services
overview:
Doublelinx provides a safe environment to buy and/or sell online marketing services. Doublelinx also provides a top notch order management system for online marketing providers. http://youtube.com/watch?v=8X0bBeGbnM0 <= 2 minute video before you continue reading.

Doublelinx uses an escrow account between the buyer and seller. When the seller does a great job, the buyer approves, and they credit the funds into the seller’s account. No monthly fees, but Doublelinx Sellers are manually approved by the Doublelinx staff to ensure quality. If there is an online marketing service that’s awesome - you’ll see it here.

Example Listing: http://www.doublelinx.com/beta/allinone-wordpress-installation-service-with-100+-premium-themes-and-features/53

Use reviews, questions, and ratings to make an education decision before you purchase. Manage all your invoices, reports, and communication in one place. Increase your website visibility - through Doublelinx.com
